Talk21:

<sp:0:2:2:6400>The children of the forest must have

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00><clr:ffff>If I had even <clr:0000>one Korok seed<clr:ffff>, <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:0:0>I could
sing and dance and use my <clr:0000>powers<clr:ffff> <sp:5:0:0>to

Talk32_01:
I'm in the middle of my travels, and I was
thinking about heading <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>next. But I'll
be here for a little bit, OK?

Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>You see me? You see me! My name<sp:5:0:0>
is Hestu.

I'm the musician of <clr:0000>Korok Forest<clr:ffff>, up
northeast.<sp:5:0:0> I'm known for my maracas
AND my dancing.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>♪Thanks for your help!<sp:5:0:0> Sha-shaka!♪

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad><sp:0:2:2:5000>Shoko...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

Talk56_01:
I left the forest to do some traveling, but
things have gotten pretty wild lately!

That's why I'm stopping at a safe place
with lots of people around.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>But I'm getting bored just standing here.
Do you want to see my dance before
you go?
Talk31:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Korok seeds<clr:ffff> make a really great sound
when you put them in maracas!

But the <clr:0000>seeds<clr:ffff> spilled all over the place
when I broke my maracas...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>And I think the children of the forest <sp:5:0:0>took
the <clr:0000>seeds<clr:ffff> while I was all in a panic.
Talk57:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So? So?! <sp:5:0:0>Are you happy with it?


<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you bring me more <clr:0000>Korok seeds<clr:ffff>, I'll
expand your inventory again.
Talk32:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00><clr:ffff>*sniff* *sniff* You don't have any
<clr:0000>Korok seeds<clr:ffff> either.

<snd:TalkPositive_01>The children of the forest took all
the seeds—they're playful little
mischief-makers.
They're probably off playing <clr:0000>hide-and-
seek<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>having fun out traveling<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Greeting_00>If you find any <clr:0000>Korok seeds<clr:ffff>, bring them
to me!
Talk58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm in the middle of traveling! <sp:5:0:0>I'm
thinking about heading <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> next.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>There's so many monsters these days
that traveling is dangerous.<sp:5:0:0> What I'd like
is to find somewhere I can relax...
I like lively places. <sp:5:0:0>Sooo maybe I'll go
somewhere lots of people hang out!
